descriptionHTML:
The number 1 Video Game News app, personalized with hundreds of news sources in a simple, sleek interface optimized for smartphones, tablets and wearables. It doesn’t matter what your platform of choice is, whether it's next-gen console, PC or mobile – Appy Gamer has your gaming news covered!

- Introducing your personal news profile! Keep track of your activities, discover your ranking, compare it with friends and followers.

- Visual: Get all the latest Video Game News from your favorite topics in a highly visual format.

- Smart: Appy Gamer learns as you read, personalizing your news experience automatically.

- In the know: My News Digest is your daily news briefing built around YOU.

- Complete: We bring you complete articles with full text, photos and videos from trusted sources around the world.

- Yours: Choose from a wide variety of gaming topics for a custom home screen and news experience.

- In-depth: Explore related topics via Tag Nav™, our innovative news navigation system.

- Customizable: Add custom headlines from your favorite RSS news feeds.

Featuring a top quality selection of leading games news sources including IGN, Gamespot, Polygon, Push Square, Eurogamer and many more.

Covers all the major platforms from mobile through XBox,PlayStation and Nintendo all the way to PC, VR, Mobile, Steam and more!

Appy Gamer is available in 9 regional editions - USA, UK, Germany, Italy, France, Spain, LatAm, China and International.
_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

"The best thing to happen to games news in a long, long time" – Critical Gamer

"A nicely designed app, full of content & easy to dive in" Pocket-Lint
_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

PERSONALIZE > EXPLORE > GET ALERTED > SHARE > RESEARCH > REACT
_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Twitter: @Appy_Gamer
Facebook - facebook.com/News.Republic
YouTube - youtube.com/MyNewsRepublic

Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2
comments: The app is pretty good since it includes all the news sources you could want and is constantly adding more.   Given the amount of sources it does mean that at times images and videos won't load probably because of compatibility issues. But there's a nice workaround to that by using the "Read this article on the web" button at the end of an article.   Comments don't work at all, but I don't mind since I wouldn't use them anyway.   Speaking of which, a nice addition would be to disable reactions to articles.   They don't really offer much since there could be many reasons for one and no way to know what everyone means by them. They can easily be used to troll so it would be nice have the option to avoid them.   Great app nonetheless and hope the feedback is taken into consideration for further improvements.

Hey enjoy this app for the most part but I just noticed something that needs to be changed quickly. When browsing with a Bluetooth mouse, wherever the pointer hovers there is a pop-up that comes up and obscures other content. Please make this an option to turn off. Thank you!

It does what it's supposed to. All my nerdy, gaming news in one spot. Doesn't overburden you with ads. The 1-2 sentence Gamespot articles get annoying though. But you could just ignore them. Someone else 2 swipes down will be reporting the exact same thing

Nice idea but the article tags are completely useless. GTA V articles are under the 3DS label, Splatoon 2 appears in the Xbox section. My Ps4 feed is made of articles tagged as Xbox 360 even though one of them is an article about the movie Wonder Woman 2... It's just useless. I am genuinely surprised when I find an article tagged correctly and in the correct feed.
Notifications are broken!! Won't let me turn them on or off. It also doesn't even show articles when I click on them? So what's the point? It just says nothing available.

I know this app for years.  But in the last few days, the only thing I can read are the top stories, because in the other sections it says "no connection to network". Why is that so? I have a Samsung S7
recentChanges: "- Create an account and become an official Appy Gamer!
- Meet your personal news profile! It shows all the articles you shared, commented on and reacted to.
- Follow your friends and learn what games news is important to them
- Follow Super Gamers and discover what's hot with the top ranked Gamers in the app
- Are you a video games addict? Get your rank and compare it with your friends, family & followers!
